description: Irish Cup holders Cliftonville defeat Crusaders 2-1 in a north Belfast derby at Seaview to secure a place in the semi-finals.
title: Irish Cup: Reds overcome Crusaders in quarter-final derby at Seaview
title_page: Irish Cup: Reds overcome Crusaders in quarter-final derby at Seaview - BBC Sport
